title: How to Create a Facebook Account for Your Pet

steps.title: Make them an email.
steps.content: Make them an email. You need an email to create a Facebook account.

steps.title: Sign up.
steps.content: Sign up. Use the email you created in Step 1 for the email.

steps.title: Upload the pictures to their Facebook account.
steps.content: Upload the pictures to their Facebook account. Have your favorite picture be their profile picture.

steps.title: Update their information.
steps.content: Update their information. Fill out everything you know about them.

steps.title: Add people to be their friends.
steps.content: Add people to be their friends. Only add people your pet has met.
